item.description:
He's Just Not that Into You @ AMC Boston Common.
Showtime is 7:40 pm.

This is the movie theater right on the Boston Common, right near the Boylston T stop on the Green Line.

Directions: Green line to Boylston or Park, Red line to Downtown Crossing, Orange line to Downtown Crossing or Chinatown. Parking available in garages nearby



Dinner if you are interested...
I'm going to grab dinner at UFood Grill (formerly Know Fat) on Washington Street in Downtown Crossing at 6pm. This is right by the theater. http://www.ufoodgrill...
Please feel free to join me if you want to grab some food and chat before the movie! Again, call my cell if you can't find me. (I'm working out a better system, I promise!)
item.name: Movie Night! He's Just Not That Into You
